CastShadowAsMasked: If true, forces translucency to cast static shadows as if the material were masked.
EmissiveBoost: Scales the emissive contribution of this material to static lighting.
DiffuseBoost: Scales the diffuse contribution of this material to static lighting.
ExportResolutionScale:
Scales the resolution that this material's attributes were exported at.
This is useful for increasing material resolution when details are needed.
